query:
Choose all the following that have an end behavior as $x \rightarrow \infty, f(x) \rightarrow \infty$. NOTE: You may choose more than one.
\begin{align*}
\text{A)}\ & f(x)=-x^{4}+3 x^{2}-x-7 &
\text{B)}\ & f(x)=x^{3}+5 x+1  \\
\text{C)}\ & f(x)=-3 x^{5}+2 x^{3}+9 x-4 &
\text{D)}\ & f(x)=-2(x-7)^{2}+4\\
\text{E)}\ & f(x)=-3 x+2 &
\text{F)}\ & f(x)=(x-8)^{2}+2\\
\end{align*}
answers_list:
To determine which functions have the end behavior \( x \rightarrow \infty, f(x) \rightarrow \infty \), we will analyze each function based on its leading term or the overall behavior as \( x \) approaches infinity.

1. **A)** \( f(x) = -x^{4} + 3 x^{2} - x - 7 \)  
   The leading term is \( -x^4 \), which approaches \( -\infty \) as \( x \rightarrow \infty \).  
   So, \( f(x) \) does not satisfy the condition.

2. **B)** \( f(x) = x^{3} + 5 x + 1 \)  
   The leading term is \( x^3 \), which approaches \( +\infty \) as \( x \rightarrow \infty \).  
   So, \( f(x) \) satisfies the condition.

3. **C)** \( f(x) = -3 x^{5} + 2 x^{3} + 9 x - 4 \)  
   The leading term is \( -3x^5 \), which approaches \( -\infty \) as \( x \rightarrow \infty \).  
   So, \( f(x) \) does not satisfy the condition.

4. **D)** \( f(x) = -2(x - 7)^{2} + 4 \)  
   Expanding this gives \( f(x) = -2(x^2 - 14x + 49) + 4 = -2x^2 + 28x - 94 \).  
   The leading term \( -2x^2 \) approaches \( -\infty \) as \( x \rightarrow \infty \).  
   So, \( f(x) \) does not satisfy the condition.

5. **E)** \( f(x) = -3x + 2 \)  
   This function is linear with a negative slope. As \( x \rightarrow \infty \), \( f(x) \rightarrow -\infty \).  
   So, \( f(x) \) does not satisfy the condition.

6. **F)** \( f(x) = (x - 8)^{2} + 2 \)  
   This expands to \( f(x) = (x^2 - 16x + 64) + 2 = x^2 - 16x + 66 \).  
   The leading term \( x^2 \) approaches \( +\infty \) as \( x \rightarrow \infty \).  
   So, \( f(x) \) satisfies the condition.

**Verification:**  
The functions B and F both have the end behavior \( f(x) \rightarrow \infty \) as \( x \rightarrow \infty \), while A, C, D, and E do not.

[Final Answer] The answer is \\boxed{B, F} \n#### B, F
